Score.title: Score
Score.description: More impact of score prediction, reduces the role of boosters.

talents.name: Outcome
talents.description: +2% Base points from the Outcome (per talent point)

talents.name: Exact
talents.description: ++2% Base points from the Exact score (per talent point)

talents.name: Renounciation
talents.description: Your League Passes all generate 1 less booster. Gain +2% Base points on all predictions.

talents.name: Both Teams Scored
talents.description: +2% points if you correctly predicted both teams to score.

talents.name: Both Teams Didn't Score
talents.description: +2% points if you correctly predicted both teams do not score.

talents.name: Over
talents.description: +2% points if you correctly predict an Over outcome.

talents.name: Under
talents.description: Get +2% points if you correctly predict an Under outcome.

talents.name: Team Stickers boost
talents.description: Bonuses from your Team Stickers are increased by 5%.

talents.name: 45' game
talents.description: If you have the correct outcome at half time, get +3% points.

talents.name: Fast learner
talents.description: Get +1% League XP from your predictions

talents.name: Both Teams Didn't Score
talents.description: You gain the ability to recycle 2 stickers into a universal outcome sticker of the same rarity.

Stability.title: Control
Stability.description: Gain more control over your boosters.
